term.title: live time

item.text: For a measurement, the time during which a radiation measuring assembly is capable of processing events occurring in the radiation detector. It equals the clock time minus the integrated resolving or dead time (to be distinguished from 'life time').

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 2513. 'Nomenclature for radioanalytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 2522 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466122513)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
